meta.name: description
meta.content: Douglas School District has six schools in the district from pre-kindergarten through 12th grade in Box Elder, SD.

li.a: Bus Route and Drop off Lane map
Project Stand Up for School Safety
Project Stand Up for School Safety

div.p:
As the end of the school year is quickly approaching, have you completed and submitted Annual Household Renewal if your students are returning next school year?
If not, you need to do it before May 20 or your students may be withdrawn and not enrolled for the 2020-21 school year. Use your Parent Portal to complete.
If you have already submitted Annual Household Renewal, thank you for your patience as we are currently processing them.

figcaption.p: AFJROTC cadets stock the district food pantry.
AFJROTC cadets stock the district food pantry.

The Douglas School District will have a food pantry open every 1st and 3rd Thursday of the every month from 3:30-6:00 p.m. If you are in need, please stop by. The pantry is located next to the bus barn. Brought to you by Feeding South Dakota.
The DHS Environmental Club teamed up with science teachers, Cherrie Martenson and Orange Johnson, to build houses for the American Kestrels,Â smallest and most common falcon in North America.
Six DHS Debate students qualify for the National Debate Tournament.

Front row L to R: Isabella Ashley and Marissa Marquez qualify in Public Forum debate. Hanna Hill and Andrew Walters qualify in Lincoln-Douglas debate. Melissa Rothe and Ashton Lockhart qualify in World School debate.

div.div: As the end of the school year is quickly approaching, have you completed and submitted Annual Household Renewal if your students are returning next school year? If not, you need to do it before May 20 or your students may be withdrawn and not enrolled for the 2020-21 school year. Use your Parent Portal to complete. If you have already submitted Annual Household Renewal, thank you for your patience as we are currently processing them.

Douglas High School wants to honor the 2020 Seniors with a Stadium drive-by on Thursday, April 16, 8:00-8:20pm. Please drive by Douglas High School and Patriot Stadium slowly on Thursday night. Decorate your cars, honk your horns, and follow social distancing guidelines. The stadium lights will be turned on and shining bright for our Douglas High School seniors. Weâ€™re proud of each of you.

h3.a: Food Pantry and Lunch Service Updates

div.div: With spring break, there will be changes to lunch service. Food Pantry will be open on Thursday, April 9 from 3:30 to 6:00pm.

div.span: Average class size in grades K-5 is 19 students.

At the secondary levels, we offer continued expansion of our Career and Technical Education, Dual-Enrollment, Fine Arts and Robotics programs.
Serving students in the Box Elder community since 1891 and Ellsworth Air Force Base since 1942.
